```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
#library(viridis)
library(p8105.datasets)

library(plotly)
```

```{r}
set.seed(1)

data(ny_noaa)

summary(is.na(ny_noaa))

clean_noaa =
ny_noaa %>% 
  filter(snow < 1300) %>% 
  mutate(tmax = as.numeric(tmax),
         tmax = tmax/10,
         tmin = as.numeric(tmin),
         tmin = tmin/10, 
         prcp = prcp/10)

snow_9999 = quantile(pull(clean_noaa, snow), .9999, na.rm = TRUE)
extreme_snow = 
  clean_noaa %>% 
    select(id, date, snow) %>% 
    filter(snow > snow_9999)


ggplot() + 
geom_line(data = clean_noaa, aes(x = date, y = snow)) +
geom_point(data = extreme_snow, aes(x = date, y = snow), color = "red", alpha = .4, size = .8)

```
